channel.title: [REL] Fiery Sword Model [REL]
channel.description:
This here is a release of a fiery sword that I made.
[IMG]http://i868.photobucket.com/albums/ab246/triplehhhhhh/NewBitmapImage-7.jpg[/img]
this is a custom picture I've drawn out that this model is based off:
[IMG]http://i868.photobucket.com/albums/ab246/triplehhhhhh/NewBitmapImage-8.jpg[/img]
here is the download link:
http://www.mediafire.com/?8hqd4992hk6yjzn
Remember to give me credit if use :)

item.title: [REL] Fiery Sword Model [REL]
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Actually the character can hold the weapon. Try it out yourself, it fits.

@Wucas
I wan’t to see some of your models please.

Read full topic

item.title: [REL] Fiery Sword Model [REL]
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“Wucas, post:5, topic:351688”]Im just going to say what we all are thinking

It looks completely terrible. Re-read the tutorial.

Sorry for being so blunt, but it is the truth

In 20 min, many of us can design 25%+ of an NPC so dont use that as an excuse[/quote]

Instead of being blunt tell him what he can do to improve the model.

Don't post in a poem format unless it all rhymes. And you're completely wrong, most of us can't model an NPC for shit, and if we can, I don't think it would be done in just over an hour.

Theres nothing wrong with the way hes posting, i find it easier to read actually.

@topic: Well theres a big window for improvement, you should start by making the handle on the hilt much longer, how is the character gonna hold that thing?

Read full topic

item.title: [REL] Fiery Sword Model [REL]
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:6, topic:351688”][quote author=Wucas link=topic=448042.msg3288250#msg3288250 date=1280356617]
Im just going to say what we all are thinking

It looks completely terrible. Re-read the tutorial.

Sorry for being so blunt, but it is the truth

In 20 min, many of us can design 25%+ of an NPC so dont use that as an excuse
[/quote]Don’t post in a poem format unless it all rhymes. And you’re completely wrong, most of us can’t model an NPC for shit, and if we can, I don’t think it would be done in just over an hour.

@Topic
Its good for a beginner. I could see it fitting in well for a server, but as a model alone, eh, not so much

For a client, 7/10
Model, 5/10. It looks like a fire blast’s shape from Pokemon and some random Japanese-looking symbols.[/quote]yea 25% of a not half done NPC would probably take atleast 1-0.7 hour.

Read full topic

It looks completely terrible. Re-read the tutorial.

Sorry for being so blunt, but it is the truth

In 20 min, many of us can design 25%+ of an NPC so dont use that as an excuse[/quote]Don’t post in a poem format unless it all rhymes. And you’re completely wrong, most of us can’t model an NPC for shit, and if we can, I don’t think it would be done in just over an hour.

@Topic
Its good for a beginner. I could see it fitting in well for a server, but as a model alone, eh, not so much

For a client, 7/10
Model, 5/10. It looks like a fire blast’s shape from Pokemon and some random Japanese-looking symbols.

item.title: [REL] Fiery Sword Model [REL]
item.dc:creator: @Wucas Wucas

item.title: [REL] Fiery Sword Model [REL]
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“man_killerx, post:2, topic:351688”]I will be honest, It looks like a 5 year old drew it. But keep practicing on your modeling skill. I would try to work on your ML (Model Logic). Because it looks blunt, And the hilt is all fugged up. Keep trying.[/quote]I did this model in 10-15 minutes. I did the drawing in 2 minutes.

Read full topic

item.title: [REL] Fiery Sword Model [REL]
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

more views, but even at that it doesn’t look all that good. 6/10 for overall design and colors.

item.title: [REL] Fiery Sword Model [REL]
item.dc:creator: @man_killerx man_killerx
item.description:
@man_killerx wrote:

I will be honest, It looks like a 5 year old drew it. But keep practicing on your modeling skill. I would try to work on your ML (Model Logic). Because it looks blunt, And the hilt is all fugged up. Keep trying.

Read full topic
